    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackController

        public TrackController(CTCOffice.CTCOffice tempOffice)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Empty constructor for whomever would like to instance the GUI can use to do so. Loads in the track lists and creates controllers based on that information.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • TrackController

        public TrackController(int id,
               int type,
               int line)
        Creates a Track Controller based on the type of infrastructure the component has.
        Parameters:
        id - ID number of the Track Controller
        type - Type of Track Controller (Switch/Crossing)
        See Also:
        TrackController()

    • Method Detail

      • activateCrossing

        public boolean activateCrossing(java.lang.String lineSelect,
                       int trackSelect)
        Function that will activate a track Crossing based on whether or not a train is near enough to cause such an event.
        Parameters:
        lineSelect - Track Line ('G' or 'R')
        trackSelect - Track Block (Selected from the list of tracks, only crossings will actually be considered)
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addTrain

        public void addTrain(char p_trackLine,
            int p_trainID,
            int p_cars)
        Function that allows the Track Controller itself, or anyone outside of it, to create a new train for the system.
        Parameters:
        p_trackLine - Track Line the train will be placed on ('G' or 'R')
        p_trainID - ID Number for the train
        p_cars - Length of the train

      • GetSuggestion

        public void GetSuggestion(java.lang.Object[] s)
        Function call for the CTC Office to send the Track Controller a message with suggestions. This function takes the message, parses it out and decides, based on certain arguments, where to send the suggestion.
        Parameters:
        s - The message array encasing the suggestion(s).

      • getTrainList

        public void getTrainList()
        Function that sends back an up to date list of trains in the system

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.io.IOException
        This is the main function that will create an instance of the GUI for the user to use in a standalone mode.
        Parameters:
        args - The list of arguments to import from the command line.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • switchTrackSegment

        public boolean switchTrackSegment()
        Function that will move a switch to given position based on params and checks that such an action is safe to perform.
        Parameters:
        lineSelect - Track Line ('G' or 'R')
        trackSegment - Track Block (Selected from the list of tracks, only switches will be considered)
        newConnect - Destination for the new switch connection.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • updateGreen

        public static java.util.ArrayList<TrackModel.trackBlock> updateGreen()

        Returns:
        ArrayList
